title: How to Avoid Debut - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Celebrities   Famous Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Music   Reluctant Protagonist   Showbiz   Singers
author: 공수교대
description:
Twenty year old Hahyun who stopped dancing for some reason, was invited to join the survival show, ‘SURVIVAL ID’ at the request of his PD Uncle. He originally thought he would be easily eliminated due to a full profile picture as a requirement, but to his shock — the reaction towards him basically flipped the whole internet upside down. Hahyun is getting closer to his debut despite him not even wanting to do so.

After a while, Hahyun gave up and finally debuted. Of course he didn’t expect things to be all smooth…

As soon as I debuted, I got a confession from a member from the same group.>
